resources.string: This is not a functional SMS app.

• Regular apps can't revoke permissions until API level 33, and even then it's cumbersome, so reverting the Read-only option here is handled manually through Settings, which should open directly upon selecting that option.

• On API levels 29+, the default SMS app is also reverted manually. This is accomplished by re-setting the original from within the app itself, and it too should open directly.

• In some cases, disabling the Full access option will leave the Read-only option enabled, even if you hadn't explicitly enabled that option beforehand.

• The status notification, if enabled, will not update until this app resumes, should a launched operation have paused it.

Full access
Using the default SMS app role

Current default:
